    <h1>Global Change Biology</h1>

    <p>Climate change and habitat modification are altering ecosystems at unprecedented rates. My research investigates how animals respond to these changes and how multiple stressors interact to affect populations.</p>

    <h2>Key Research Questions</h2>
    <ul>
      <li>How do multiple environmental stressors interact to affect animal populations?</li>
      <li>What makes some species more vulnerable to environmental change than others?</li>
      <li>How can we predict and mitigate impacts of global change on wildlife?</li>
      <li>What role does behavioural plasticity play in adapting to rapid environmental change?</li>
    </ul>
